description: This easy air fryer tofu is crispy, delicious, and comes together in a flash! Perfect for stuffing sandwiches, topping salads, or just snacking!
keywords: air fryer recipe, easy tofu recipe
name: Crispy Air Fryer Tofu
recipeIngredient: 1 (16 ounce or 454 gram) package super firm tofu*, (cut into 1-inch pieces)
1 tablespoon peanut oil (or high-heat oil of choice)
Optional spices, (such as cumin, smoked paprika, ginger, onion powder, garlic powder, or cayenne pepper)

recipeInstructions.text: Place all ingredients into a large bowl and gently stir to mix the ingredients and evenly coat the tofu.
Arrange the tofu pieces in a single layer in your air fryer basket, so they are not touching. Cook them in batches if necessary.
Air fry the tofu at 425Â°F for 15 minutes, until browned and crispy.
